title: How to Dress Properly for a Wedding (Men, Teen Boys and Kids)

steps.title: Wear either a polo shirt or a short sleeved button-down shirt.
steps.content: Wear either a polo shirt or a short sleeved button-down shirt.

steps.title: Wear khakis or a pair of slacks.
steps.content: Wear khakis or a pair of slacks. Dress pants are okay, although jeans are not acceptable.

steps.title: Wear a belt!
steps.content: Wear a belt! Especially if you are going to tuck in your pants.

steps.title: Get dress shoes.
steps.content: Get dress shoes. Loafers are good too. You don't need to be matchy-matchy: contrasting leathers and even ombre-dyed oxfords are also very stylish.

steps.title: Wear a long-sleeved button-down dress shirt (any color) tucked into pants.
steps.content: Wear a long-sleeved button-down dress shirt (any color) tucked into pants.

steps.title: Wear slacks or dress pants, belt and a pair of dress shoes.
steps.content: Wear slacks or dress pants, belt and a pair of dress shoes. [1] X Research source

steps.title: A blazer/sport jacket is optional.
steps.content: A blazer/sport jacket is optional. You can get away with no tie but it's recommended to wear one if you have one available. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Wear a 2 piece suit.
steps.content: Wear a 2 piece suit. A gray or cream color with a tie is better for daytime weddings, while a darker color suit is better for nighttime. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Wear dress shoes and dress pants.
steps.content: Wear dress shoes and dress pants. If you can't get access to a suit, then at minimum you should wear casual business attire with a blazer/sports jacket, dress pants, and a button-down shirt.

steps.title: If accessible, a tie should be worn.
steps.content: If accessible, a tie should be worn. [4] X Research source This is typically expected, but not always, so don't hesitate to reach out to the person who invited you for more clarification.

steps.title: Wear a 3 piece suit (suit and a vest underneath) with dress shoes and dress pants.
steps.content: Wear a 3 piece suit (suit and a vest underneath) with dress shoes and dress pants. However if you wish you can wear a tuxedo if it is an evening wedding. If you only have a 2 piece suit it is okay, but try to find a vest. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Wear a black tuxedo, a white dress shirt, black vest and a black bow-tie.
steps.content: Wear a black tuxedo, a white dress shirt, black vest and a black bow-tie. These days people do wear a black tie but a bow-tie is better. You cannot wear anything less than a tuxedo. If you don't have one, rent one. [6] X Research source The pocket square you wear with a tuxedo should be white and worn in a flat fold of puff fold.

steps.title: Get creative with your tie.
steps.content: Get creative with your tie. This is black tie, except you can change the color of your tuxedo, tie, etc. if you want to. So that means it doesn't have to be black and white. [7] X Research source If you are invited to a white tie wedding, congratulations! White tie consists of a black tailcoat jacket, full white waistcoat, wing-tipped collared dress shirt, self-tied white bow tie, and patent leather dress shoes. This is your only choice. You cannot wear anything else.
